About Me

BIO

Hi, I am MD Mizanur Rahman Rony, currently working with web technologies specially frontend. I am interested in working with web development, machine learning with python and Software development. I have done a few web development projects for my academic and professional purpose. Moreover, I have worked on a fun project with my friends to develop a dynamic blog site named "SecureBangla". I have tried to solve some programming problems given in URI online judge. Which helped me to increase my programming skills. You can find the detail informations in the “My Work” section.

Restaurent Management System(marketing page)

Front end Developer

The requirement was like building ressponsive design and follow figma for creating the UI for the web. The purpose for this project was arketing about the full fledge management software for the restaurents. My role was to make this as dynamic with hash routing.

Store CMS

Front end Developer

It is an internal project of Builder.ai. Here I was developing new complex UI from figma for shiping module. My role was follow the figma and create the UI for web and integrate api's for realtime data handling.

Geographycal Indication

Front end Developer

This is an government project of India. My role was to contrubute in the frontend and connect with restful api's.

Neeuh Finance

Front end Developer

This is a finance company in USA and I contributed in this project as a front end developer for the web application. I built the dashboard, tax calculation and password recovary page along with the whole application. I got this peoject through my office.

Research Intern

VR developer

This is an internship project after successfully completed the course from IIT Guwahati. I was developing a vr experience with unity 3d under the guidance of IIT Guwahati CSE department. This was an history restoration project for Majuli Island.

Hate speech detection from social networking post

data visualization & twitter data puller

This is our thesis project where I have contributed the data visualization and manually data pulling from twitter. I have used python to do this job.
